title: Episode 178: Glowed Up & Left (Feat. Dreezy)
itunes:title: Episode 178: Glowed Up & Left (Feat. Dreezy)
description:
Rapper, singer, and songwriter Dreezy joins the ladies of the Lip Service this week and opens up about why her longest relationship ended, leading people on, as well as schooling the ladies about 'Sweetest Day.' Dreezy breaks down why her man isn't allowed to be friends with her ex, and much more. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
